hero.sloganEn: Based in Hong Kong, Serving the World

about.title: About Us
about.description:
Based in Hong Kong, the international financial center, we are a professional licensed asset management institution. With strict compliance operations and professional investment capabilities, we are committed to creating long-term stable investment returns for our clients.

Driven by data for professional investment and protected by systems for client assets, we build a trustworthy digital wealth platform for every investor.

business.title: Business Areas
business.description: We provide comprehensive professional investment management services, covering asset management, securities consulting, and investment strategy formulation. From professional analysis to asset allocation, we escort the appreciation of your wealth. Adhering to the concept of value investment, based on in-depth market research and risk control, we build a diversified investment portfolio to pursue the goals of long-term stable returns and asset preservation and appreciation.

advantage.title: Core Advantages
advantage.description:
Bringing together a senior professional team, strict compliance operation mechanisms, tailor-made investment solutions, and diversified service capabilities, we use professional strength to help clients achieve the goal of stable wealth appreciation.

We not only serve clients but also manage long-term trusting relationships.
The service positioning of N Plus Capital is not a "customer service center" but a "gatekeeper of wealth security".
We always believe that truly excellent financial services are not packaged, but shaped by systems, transparency, and a sense of companionship.

qualification.title: Qualifications & Certifications
qualification.description: Holding the formal Licenses Type 4 and Type 9 of the Hong Kong Securities and Futures Commission (SFC), we strictly follow regulatory requirements and establish a sound compliance system to provide a solid legal guarantee for clients' investment safety. We have established a professional and standardized service process system to ensure transparent and efficient investment decisions, providing full-process professional services from client needs analysis to investment execution monitoring.

strength.title: Strength Demonstration
strength.description:
Our asset management scale continues to grow steadily, serving institutional investors and high-net-worth individual clients, and establishing a good reputation and professional status in the Hong Kong asset management market.

With a professional team and rigorous investment process, we create long-term value for clients and become a trustworthy wealth management partner.

hero.title: About Us
hero.description: Based in Hong Kong, the international financial center, we are a professional licensed asset management institution. With strict compliance operations and professional investment capabilities, we are committed to creating long-term stable investment returns for our clients.

overview.title: Company Overview
overview.description: N Plus Capital Limited is a professional licensed asset management institution based in Hong Kong, the international financial center. Holding Type 4 (Advising on Securities) and Type 9 (Asset Management) licenses from the Hong Kong Securities and Futures Commission (SFC), we are committed to creating long-term stable investment returns for our clients with strict compliance operations and professional investment capabilities.

mission.title: Company Mission
mission.highlight: Drive professional investment with data, safeguard client assets with systems, and build a trustworthy digital wealth platform for every investor.
mission.description: The mission of N Plus Capital is to provide clients with safe, efficient, and stable investment services through a rigorous product screening mechanism, intelligent risk management system, and a fund guarantee system underwritten by a third-party insurance company.
mission.commitment: We are dedicated to bringing investment back to its essence and making trust the foundation of capital flow.

vision.title: Company Vision
vision.highlight: Become a leading Asian digital asset management platform, making high-quality financial services accessible to every user.
vision.description: We aim to break down financial barriers through the integration of technology and professionalism, ensuring capital allocation is no longer exclusive to a few. We believe that inclusive, transparent, and verifiable financial services can truly achieve mutual growth between clients and the platform.

items.title: Professional Prudence
items.description: Every product is evaluated by financial experts with established risk control logic, avoiding blind pursuit of high returns. Our team has diverse backgrounds, building client trust with professional capabilities.

items.title: Stability & Safety
items.description: The system strictly implements identity verification, transaction control, fund custody, and insurance mechanisms. Pacific Insurance Company is introduced to provide real and effective risk underwriting for each product.

items.title: Compliance & Transparency
items.description: Comply with financial regulations to protect user data and funds, ensuring clarity, traceability, and reasonable control. The entire process follows KYC and AML standards.

items.title: Client-Centric
items.description: Design processes and products with user interests at the core, ensuring both experience and protection. No exaggeration or misdirection—only provide real, traceable, and risk-controlled investment options.

items.title: Data-Driven
items.description: From product screening, risk control models, and investment allocation to client fund custody and monitoring, every decision is based on detailed data, market insights, and professional judgment.

items.title: Mutual Growth
items.description: We are not just an investment platform but a long-term wealth growth partner for our clients. Accompany users through market cycles to achieve long-term stable asset growth.

hero.title: Core Advantages
hero.description: Bringing together a senior professional team, strict compliance operation mechanisms, tailor-made investment solutions, and diversified service capabilities, we use professional strength to help clients achieve the goal of stable wealth appreciation.

items.title: Professional Authorized Asset Allocation Capability
items.description: Led by experienced asset managers, providing professional portfolio management services

items.title: Formal License & Compliance Mechanism
items.description: Authorized by SFC, Type 4 and Type 9 licenses + dedicated responsible persons to ensure compliant operations

items.title: Strong Background of Senior Team
items.description: The management team has years of experience and market resources in Hong Kong's asset management industry

items.title: Diversified Service Capabilities
items.description: Covering stock investment, asset management, investment strategy formulation, and compliance consulting

platformAdvantages.title: Platform Service Advantages
items: Diversified product lines to meet different risk levels and liquidity needs
Professional risk control review for the entire product process, all underwritten by Pacific Insurance Company
Providing client asset reports, online advisors, regular market reviews, and portfolio suggestions
Providing configuration consulting services for corporate taxation, fund paths, and entrustment structures
platformAdvantages.trustTitle: We believe that trust is the beginning of long-term cooperation
platformAdvantages.trustDescription: N Plus Capital does not pursue short-term marketing conversion but focuses on providing the sustainable and verifiable asset growth path for each client.

customerService.title: Customer Service Features
customerService.subtitle: 6 Core Advantages of N Plus Capital's Customer Service

features.title: Efficient Response | Professional Customer Service Team Online Daily
features: Provides daily 09:00–23:00 live online service, regardless of holidays
Supports multiple languages (Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, English) to fit Asian client habits
Average response time for customer issues < 3 minutes to ensure no investment waiting

features.title: One-on-One Dedicated Advisor System
features: Dedicated advisor services for high-net-worth clients and corporate legal entities
Online asset diagnosis meetings can be scheduled to analyze product portfolios and fund allocations
Advisors can assist in preparing pre-investment documents, product policy numbers, compliance materials, etc.

features.title: Full-Process Investment Assistance
features: From account opening, identity verification, fund storage, position building, to withdrawal, each step has complete illustrations and operation instructions
Set up a FAQ center to solve more than 95% of common user questions

features.title: Safe and Transparent Account System
features: Users can view in real time: fund details, transaction records, freeze status, and policy documents
Withdrawal, transfer, and position building all have system reminders + operation confirmation mechanisms
Every operation is reviewed by both system and manual to ensure accuracy

features.title: Data Security and Client Privacy Mechanism
features: All personal and investment data are encrypted and stored, and the platform implements a minimum privilege mechanism
Users can apply for data deactivation, freezing, or deletion, and the system processes and feedbacks the processing records in accordance with the law
Transaction data and identity information are layered and managed, and regularly subject to third-party audits and compliance assessments

features.title: Insurance Underwriting × Dual Risk Control Support
features: All products complete risk control modeling + real policy underwriting by Pacific Insurance Company before launch
Clients can request underwriting certificates, fund placement instructions, and insurance documents through customer service
In case of system problems not caused by users, the platform promises to actively assist in applying for claim support

customerService.philosophyTitle: We not only serve clients but also manage long-term trusting relationships
customerService.philosophyDescription1: The service positioning of N Plus Capital is not a 'customer service center' but a 'gatekeeper of wealth security'.
customerService.philosophyDescription2: We always believe that truly excellent financial services are not packaged, but shaped by systems, transparency, and a sense of companionship.

hero.title: Business Areas
hero.description: Provide comprehensive professional investment management services, covering asset management, securities consulting, and investment strategy formulation. From professional analysis to asset allocation, we escort the appreciation of your wealth. Adhering to the concept of value investment, based on in-depth market research and risk control, we build a diversified investment portfolio to pursue the goals of long-term stable returns and asset preservation and appreciation.

items.title: Asset Management
items.description: Focused on stock investment and asset allocation, portfolio management according to investment authorization, providing professional portfolio construction services

items.title: Securities Consulting
items.description: Providing investment advice services on securities and derivatives (Type 4 license), offering professional investment consulting to clients

items.title: Investment Strategy
items.description: Through the investment advisory team, combining research, market analysis, and client authorization to provide tailor-made services

investmentAreas.title: Specific Investment Areas
investmentAreas.description: N Plus Capital focuses on diversified and stable asset allocation, with the core strategy of 'equity growth + income management', providing clients with long-term investment opportunities across cycles. Our team combines market trends with risk control models, focusing on the following four investment directions:

areas.title: IPO Subscription and Equity Placement
areas.subtitle: Pre-IPO Allocation
areas.description: We closely connect with the IPO listing processes of domestic and foreign exchanges, focusing on high-quality enterprises that have passed listing guidance, participating in their placement or private pre-round investments.
features: Covering mainstream capital markets such as Hong Kong, US, and A-shares
Target enterprises with clear listing schedules or sponsorship qualifications
Utilizing low-allocation high-potential to obtain scarce equity dividends

areas.title: PIPE Structured Private Placement Fund
areas.subtitle: Private Investment in Public Equity
areas.description: Through structured PIPE projects, enter the private placement round of listed enterprises in advance, combining arbitrage hedging mechanisms to achieve medium and short-term returns.
features: Suitable for high-net-worth clients and advanced investors
Configurable with structures such as repurchase clauses, transfer mechanisms, and fixed-income bottom positions
Achieve 'locking annualized returns under risk control'

areas.title: ETF Fixed Income Allocation
areas.subtitle: Exchange-Traded Fund Allocation
areas.description: The platform selects low-volatility, high-liquidity index ETFs, suitable for long-term holding and stable growth of client asset allocation.
features: Investment portfolios set by professional quantitative teams to track targets
Can be used as a 'basic position' for client funds or a tool to hedge asset fluctuations
Used in conjunction with demand deposit wealth management accounts to improve overall fund efficiency

areas.title: Demand Deposit Wealth Management Account
areas.subtitle: Flexible Wealth Management
areas.description: Provides daily可观收益 (considerable returns), lock-up-free demand products, suitable for fund scheduling, short-term storage, or low-risk value-added needs.
features: Supports deposit and withdrawal at any time, with returns compounded daily
Used in conjunction with platform IPO or PIPE investments to maximize fund allocation efficiency
System automatically accrues interest, transparent and traceable

advantages: Before any product launch, the professional team of the platform evaluates the project background, financial model, and risk factors
Each product is underwritten by Pacific Insurance Company, and the platform assumes the scope of guarantee liability
Strictly implement fund custody, risk control layering, transaction review, dual-channel withdrawal and other mechanisms
Support flexible portfolio allocation: clients can freely switch positions of different products according to fund liquidity needs

clientTypes.title: Types of Clients Served
clientTypes.description: Based on 'professional financial products + high-standard safety guarantees + flexible liquidity allocation', N Plus Capital is committed to serving the following four client groups with clear needs for asset allocation and stable appreciation:

types.title: Beginner Investors
types.goal: Goal: Safe start, flexible storage, low-threshold participation
characteristics: Limited experience in financial products, expecting simple operation
Hoping for daily returns on idle funds
Valuing fund liquidity and unwilling to assume large risks
Mostly use low-risk product combinations such as demand deposit wealth management and ETF allocation
types.recommendedProducts: Demand Deposit Wealth Management Account, Basic ETF Strategy Portfolio

types.title: Conservative Investors
types.goal: Goal: Stable returns, clear cycle, controllable risk
characteristics: Some financial experience, pursuing stable returns of 8%~20% annualized
Acceptable fund lock-up period of 1~6 months
Concerned about asset safety and insurance mechanism protection
Interested in IPO projects or structured funds, but value exit mechanisms and compliance
types.recommendedProducts: IPO Equity Plan (Pre-IPO), Structured PIPE Fund, Demand Deposit Matching

types.title: High-Net-Worth Individuals (HNWI)
types.goal: Goal: Diversified allocation, tax optimization, precise entry into early-stage equity projects
characteristics: Awareness of asset diversification, focusing on global market trends
Seeking equity-type, strategic, and high-leverage structure allocation solutions
Valuing platform security, exit paths, underwriting mechanisms, and report transparency
types.recommendedProducts: PIPE Private Placement Products, Pre-IPO Equity Subscription, Customized Portfolio

types.title: Corporate Legal Entities/Family Trusts
types.goal: Goal: Long-term fund allocation, structured management, coexistence of preservation and appreciation
characteristics: Enterprises or family offices holding long-term idle funds
Needing to meet financial accounting, compliance audit, and trust structure requirements
Valuing stable cash flow, portfolio defensive allocation, and liquidity arrangements
Tending to long-term cooperation with the platform, strategy customization, and dedicated advisor docking
types.recommendedProducts: Special Fund Allocation, ETF-PIPE Matching Structure,专户策略定制服务 (Dedicated Account Strategy Customization Service)

hero.description: We look forward to building long-term cooperative relationships with you and providing professional asset management services.

contactInfo.description: Welcome to contact us through the following methods, and our professional team will wholeheartedly serve you.

businessHours.title: Business Hours
businessHours.note: Closed on Sundays and public holidays

appointment.title: Appointment Consultation
appointment.description: High-net-worth clients can make appointments for dedicated advisor services
appointment.method: Please make an appointment via email or customer service

contactNote.title: Before Contacting Us
contactNote.description: It is recommended that you prepare relevant questions or requirement descriptions in advance so that our professional team can more effectively assist you. We value every communication opportunity and are committed to providing you with the best service experience.

hero.title: Regulatory Compliance
hero.description: Holding formal Type 4 and Type 9 licenses from the Hong Kong SFC, strictly following regulatory requirements, and establishing a sound compliance system to provide a solid legal guarantee for clients' investment safety. We have established a professional and standardized service process system to ensure transparent and efficient investment decisions, providing full-process professional services from client needs analysis to investment execution monitoring.

licenseTypes.title: License Types and Regulatory Scope
licenseTypes.description: N Plus Capital Limited holds the following two categories of SFC license scopes:

types.title: Type 4 (Asset Management)
types.description: Asset management business, including managing client portfolios

types.title: Type 9 (Providing Advice on Collective Investment Schemes)
types.description: Providing professional advice and evaluation on collective investment schemes such as funds and ETFs

complianceStatus.title: Current Compliance Status
complianceStatus.description: Complies with the SFC's configuration requirements for relevant license qualifications. The company continues to maintain an active license status, with no records of suspension or revocation, and accepts regular supervision and review by the SFC.

points.title: Lawful and Compliant Operation
points.description: Authorization from the SFC is required to carry out asset management and fund advisory business in compliance with regulations

points.title: Professional Management Responsibility
points.description: ROs are required to hold senior management positions and undertake legal responsibilities to ensure service quality

points.title: Enhanced Customer Trust
points.description: The SFC has strict supervision and high transparency, and the authorized license provides customer confidence

points.title: Continuous Regulatory Assessment
points.description: Regularly submit audit reports and license renewal applications to ensure long-term risk control and compliance

summary.title: Professional Compliance, Trustworthy
summary.description: N Plus Capital Limited holds the BLY077 license for Asset Management (Type 4) and Collective Investment Scheme Advisory (Type 9) issued by the SFC, and is equipped with an experienced RO team, meeting regulatory standards and ensuring safe and compliant business operations.

sections.title: Regulatory Compliance Framework
items: Strictly follow SFC regulatory requirements and industry best practices
Establish a sound internal control and risk management system
Regularly accept regulatory inspections and third-party audits
Continuously update compliance policies to adapt to regulatory changes

sections.title: Customer Protection Measures
items: Implement KYC (Know Your Customer) and AML (Anti-Money Laundering) procedures
Client funds are independently managed and strictly separated from company assets
Provide transparent fee structures and investment risk disclosures
Establish customer complaint handling mechanisms and dispute resolution procedures

sections.title: Professional Responsibility System
items: Designate Responsible Officers (ROs) to assume legal and regulatory responsibilities
All employees must pass relevant qualification exams and ongoing training
Establish conflict of interest identification and management mechanisms
Ensure investment advice complies with the principle of clients' best interests

sections.title: Information Security and Privacy
items: Adopt bank-level data encryption and security protection measures
Strictly control access to customer information
Regularly conduct cybersecurity assessments and penetration testing
Comply with personal data protection regulatory requirements

commitment.title: Our Compliance Commitment
commitment.description: N Plus Capital Limited is committed to maintaining the highest standards of compliant operations to ensure all business activities meet regulatory requirements. We believe that strict compliance management is not only a legal obligation but also the best response to customer trust. We will continue to invest in the construction of a compliance system to provide clients with safe, transparent, and professional investment services.

hero.title: Strength Demonstration
hero.description: The scale of assets under management continues to grow steadily, serving institutional investors and high-net-worth individuals, establishing a good reputation and professional status in the Hong Kong asset management market

points.title: Senior Investment Management
points.description: CIO Ivy Xing has managed assets exceeding tens of millions of US dollars, with rich institutional-level asset management experience

points.title: Professional Advisory Background
points.description: The team has many years of professional advisory experience, serving a client base including institutions and high-net-worth individual investors

clientDistribution.title: Client Quantity and Type Distribution
clientDistribution.description: As of December 2024, N Plus Capital has provided professional asset management services to over 5,200 registered users.

details.title: Beginner Investors (Approx. 40%)
details.description: Users who hope to obtain daily returns and have strong account liquidity, using demand deposit wealth management products.

details.title: Conservative Investors (Approx. 35%)
details.description: Medium-term investors who have a balanced demand for returns and risks, participating in IPO subscriptions and structured funds.

details.title: High-Net-Worth Clients (Approx. 20%)
details.description: Holding asset allocation of over $1 million, preferring equity-type allocations such as PIPE and Pre-IPO.

details.title: Corporate/Institutional Clients (Approx. 5%)
details.description: Including small and medium enterprises, family trusts, and institutional funds, focusing on long-term stable allocation and compliance reporting.

points.title: Hong Kong Market Position
points.description: Established a good reputation and professional status in the Hong Kong asset management market

points.title: Steady Growth
points.description: The scale of assets under management continues to grow steadily, and customer trust continues to increase

points.title: Diversified Services
points.description: Services cover institutional investors and high-net-worth individual clients

hero.title: Professional Team
hero.description: Our team always adheres to the customer-centric service concept, providing personalized professional consulting and comprehensive investment support to ensure that customer rights are fully protected and respected

overview.title: Our Team
overview.subtitle: Professionalism is the foundation of trust

members.name: 郑伟良（Henry Cheng）
details: With over 15 years of financial industry experience, having worked in multiple international investment banks and family offices
Specialized in cross-border asset allocation, IPO project underwriting, and structured fund management
Currently serves as the head of N Plus Capital's asset management business (Type 4 & 9 license holder)

members.name: 黄秋云（Qiuyun Huang）
members.position: Head of Risk Control and Products
details: Former senior product manager at a leading Asian securities company, leading PIPE private equity and ETF portfolio building strategies
Holds a CFA (Chartered Financial Analyst) certification and Hong Kong local fund sales certification
Responsible for platform risk control mechanisms, insurance configuration, and pre-investment due diligence review

members.name: Helen Lo
members.responsibility: Responsible for portfolio investment and investment strategies

members.name: Ivy Xing
members.responsibility: Managed assets exceeding tens of millions of US dollars

members.name: Chelsea Mak
members.responsibility: Responsible for compliance and external regulatory docking

departments.name: 投资研究团队
responsibilities: Composed of senior researchers from investment banks, securities firms, trust companies, and asset management institutions
Specialized in primary equity market analysis (Pre-IPO), industry rotation strategies, valuation modeling, and risk scenario simulation
Most members have international financial institution backgrounds and are familiar with Hong Kong and Southeast Asian capital markets

departments.name: 风控与法务顾问
responsibilities: Equipped with full-time Compliance Officers and cooperating with external law firms
Responsible for platform AML/KYC reviews, transaction anomaly monitoring, SFC reporting, and regulatory response
Regularly conducts product risk reassessments and policy updates to ensure compliant operations

departments.name: 客户服务团队
responsibilities: All members have financial backgrounds and are capable of serving in Chinese (Simplified/Traditional) and English
Provides daily online service (09:00–23:00), covering the entire process of account opening, fund storage, position building, and withdrawal
Advisory service-oriented, supporting one-on-one product explanations, fund path planning, and policy verification

advantages.title: Professional Qualifications
advantages.description: Team members all possess relevant financial certifications and rich industry experience

advantages.title: Global Vision
advantages.description: With international financial institution backgrounds, familiar with global capital market operations

advantages.title: Customer First
advantages.description: Always adhering to a customer-centric approach, providing personalized professional services
